title: Manage the Boarding Process
description: A gate agent needs to manage the boarding process for a full flight.

tasks.description: Make pre-boarding announcements, inviting passengers who need extra assistance to board first.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes clear and timely announcements.

tasks.description: Board the aircraft by zones or groups, scanning each passenger's boarding pass.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows the standard boarding procedure and scans all boarding passes.

tasks.description: Reconcile the passenger count with the flight manifest and formally close the flight.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all boarded passengers are on the manifest and closes the flight in the system.
